metadata.titleEn: Genome Assembly of Alpine Species Salix Brachista on the Tibetan Plateau (2019)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原高山植物小垫柳基因组组装数据集（2019）
metadata.description:
This dataset is collected from the paper: Chen, J.*#, Huang, Y.*#, Brachi, B.*#, Yun, Q.*#, Zhang, W., Lu, W., Li, H., Li, W., Sun, X., Wang, G., He, J., Zhou, Z., Chen, K., Ji, Y., Shi, M., Sun, W., Yang, Y.*, Zhang, R.#, Abbott, R. J.*, & Sun, H.* (2019). Genome-wide analysis of Cushion willow provides insights into alpine plant divergence in a biodiversity hotspot. Nature Communications, 10(1), 5230. doi:10.1038/s41467-019-13128-y. 
This data contains the genome assembly of alpine species Salix brachista on the Tibetan Plateau, it contains DNA, RNA, Protein files in Fasta format and the annotation file in gff format.
Assembly Level: Draft genome in chromosome level
Genome Representation: Full Genome
Reference Genome: yes
Assembly method: SMARTdenovo 1.0; CANU 1.3
Sequencing & coverage: PacBio 125.0; Illumina Hiseq X Ten 43.0; Oxford Nanopore Technologies 74.0
Statistics of Genome Assembly:
Genome size (bp): 339,587,529
GC content: 34.15%
Chromosomes sequence No.: 19
Organellas sequence No.: 2
Genome sequence No.: 30
Maximum genome sequence length (bp): 39,688,537
Minimum genome sequence length (bp): 57,080
Average genome sequence length (bp): 11,319,584
Genome sequence N50 (bp): 17,922,059
Genome sequence N90 (bp): 13,388,179
Annotation of Whole Genome Assembly:
Protein：30,209
tRNA：784
rRNA：118
ncRNA：671
Please see attachments for more details of annotation.
The tables in the Supplementary Information of this article can also be found in this dataset. The table list is represented in attachments.
The accession no. of genome assembly is GWHAAZH00000000 (https://bigd.big.ac.cn/gwh/Assembly/663/show).
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集来源于论文：Chen, J.*#, Huang, Y.*#, Brachi, B.*#, Yun, Q.*#, Zhang, W., Lu, W., Li, H., Li, W., Sun, X., Wang, G., He, J., Zhou, Z., Chen, K., Ji, Y., Shi, M., Sun, W., Yang, Y.*, Zhang, R.#, Abbott, R. J.*, & Sun, H.* (2019). Genome-wide analysis of Cushion willow provides insights into alpine plant divergence in a biodiversity hotspot. Nature Communications, 10(1), 5230. doi:10.1038/s41467-019-13128-y.
本数据集包含青藏高原高山植物小垫柳Fasta格式的基因组组装文件，包括核苷酸（DNA）、核糖核酸（RNA）、蛋白质编码序列（Protein）序列数据，以及gff格式的基因组组装注释文件。
组装等级：染色体级别
基因组覆盖程度：全基因组
参考基因组：是
组装方法：SMARTdenovo 1.0; CANU 1.3
测序方法及测序深度： PacBio, 125×; Illumina Hiseq X Ten, 43×; Oxford Nanopore Technologies, 74×
基因组组装统计：
基因组大小（bp）：339,587,529
GC含量：34.15%
染色体数量：19
细胞器基因组数量：2
基因组组装序列数量：30
最大组装序列长度（bp）：39,688,537
最小组装序列长度（bp）：57,080
平均组装序列长度（bp）：11,319,584
基因组组装序列N50（bp）：17,922,059
基因组组装序列N90（bp）：13,388,179
全基因组组装注释：
Protein：30,209
tRNA：784
rRNA：118
ncRNA：671
详细的注释信息请参见附件。
本数据集中也包含文章中Supplementary Information中的表格数据，数据列表参见附件。
基因组项目号为：GWHAAAA00000000（https://bigd.big.ac.cn/gwh/Assembly/663/show）。
metadata.instructions:
The data in Supplementary Information is named according to the paper, it can be viewed and edited by Excel software of Microsoft Office;
The data of genome assembly can be viewed by notepad software.
metadata.instructionsCn:
Supplementary Information中的表格数据以论文中的命名方式命名，可用Microsoft Office中的Excel软件进行查看和编辑；
基因组组装数据可用记事本打开查看。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used for assembling the genome of an alpine plant species at the chromosome level?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一种用于在染色体水平上组装高山植物物种基因组的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used for assembling the genome of an alpine plant species at the chromosome level is the combination of sequencing technologies such as PacBio with a depth of 125×, Illumina Hiseq X Ten with a depth of 43×, and Oxford Nanopore Technologies with a depth of 74×. The assembly was performed using methods like SMARTdenovo 1.0 and CANU 1.3, achieving a chromosome-level assembly for the genome of Cushion willow.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于在染色体水平上组装高山植物物种基因组的数据收集方法的一个例子是结合使用多种测序技术，如PacBio，深度为125×，Illumina Hiseq X Ten，深度为43×，以及Oxford Nanopore Technologies，深度为74×。组装使用了SMARTdenovo 1.0和CANU 1.3等方法，成功实现了Cushion willow基因组的染色体水平组装。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of genome assembly methods used for alpine plants in high-altitude environments?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于高海拔环境中高山植物的基因组组装方法的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: SMARTdenovo 1.0, CANU 1.3, chromosome-level assembly, whole genome coverage, PacBio depth of 125×, Illumina Hiseq X Ten 43×, Oxford Nanopore Technologies 74×, genome size 339,587,529 bp, 19 chromosomes, GC content 34.15%
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: SMARTdenovo 1.0，CANU 1.3，染色体水平组装，全基因组覆盖，PacBio深度125×，Illumina Hiseq X Ten 43×，Oxford Nanopore Technologies 74×，基因组大小339,587,529 bp，19条染色体，GC含量34.15%

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the total sequencing depth used in the genome assembly of Cushion willow from the Tibetan Plateau?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 藏族高原的垫状柳基因组组装中使用的总测序深度是多少？

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the sequencing depths and technologies used in genome assembly of alpine plants compare with those used in other high-altitude plant genome projects?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 高山植物基因组组装中使用的测序深度和技术与其他高海拔植物基因组项目中使用的相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The genome assembly of alpine plants on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau uses sequencing technologies such as PacBio with a depth of 125×, Illumina Hiseq X Ten with a depth of 43×, and Oxford Nanopore Technologies with a depth of 74×. These methods and depths may vary in other high-altitude plant genome projects, depending on the specific requirements of the project and the resources available, potentially affecting the assembly quality and completeness.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 青藏高原的高山植物基因组组装使用了多种测序技术，如PacBio，深度为125×；Illumina Hiseq X Ten，深度为43×；以及Oxford Nanopore Technologies，深度为74×。这些方法和深度在其他高海拔植物基因组项目中可能会有所不同，具体取决于项目的特定要求和可用资源，这可能会影响组装的质量和完整性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the selection of specific sequencing methods and depth for genome assembly in alpine plant genomics?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在高山植物基因组学中，选择特定测序方法和深度的因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The selection of sequencing methods and depth in alpine plant genomics is influenced by the need for high-quality, comprehensive data to cover the entire genome. In this case, multiple sequencing technologies, including PacBio, Illumina Hiseq X Ten, and Oxford Nanopore Technologies, were chosen to achieve a combined sequencing depth of 125×, 43×, and 74× respectively. This multi-platform approach allows researchers to take advantage of the strengths of each technology, such as high accuracy, long reads, and coverage, to ensure a robust and complete genome assembly, especially at the chromosome level. The specific choices are likely influenced by the complexity of the genome, the GC content, and the need for accurate assembly and annotation of chromosome-level sequences.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在高山植物基因组学中，测序方法和深度的选择受到对高质量、全面数据的需求的影响，以覆盖整个基因组。在这种情况下，选择了多种测序技术，包括PacBio、Illumina Hiseq X Ten和Oxford Nanopore Technologies，以实现分别为125×、43×和74×的综合测序深度。这种多平台的方法使研究人员能够利用每种技术的优势，如高准确性、长读长和覆盖率，以确保基因组组装的稳健性和完整性，特别是在染色体水平上。具体的选择可能受到基因组复杂性、GC含量以及对染色体水平序列的准确组装和注释需求的影响。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of assembling a genomic dataset at the chromosome level for alpine plants in biodiversity hotspots?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在生物多样性热点地区为高山植物组装染色体水平的基因组数据集的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to provide insights into the genetic divergence of alpine plants, particularly the Cushion willow, in biodiversity hotspots like the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. This high-resolution genomic data helps in understanding plant adaptation and evolution in extreme environments.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是提供关于高山植物，特别是垫状柳，在生物多样性热点如青藏高原的遗传分化的见解。这些高分辨率的基因组数据有助于理解植物在极端环境中的适应和进化。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to assemble a genome at the chromosome level, and what specific sequencing technologies and coverage depths are involved in such a process?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 组装染色体水平基因组的程序包括哪些步骤，以及在此过程中涉及哪些特定的测序技术和覆盖深度？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The genome assembly at the chromosome level involves using assembly methods such as SMARTdenovo 1.0 and CANU 1.3. The specific sequencing technologies used include PacBio with a coverage depth of 125×, Illumina Hiseq X Ten with 43×, and Oxford Nanopore Technologies with 74×.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 基因组组装在染色体水平上涉及使用如SMARTdenovo 1.0和CANU 1.3等组装方法。使用的具体测序技术包括PacBio，覆盖深度为125×，Illumina Hiseq X Ten为43×，以及Oxford Nanopore Technologies为74×。
